00045 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_CLASS
00046 
00047 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00048 #include <obd_support.h>
00049 #include <lu_object.h>
00050 #include <md_object.h>
00051 
00052 /* context key constructor/destructor: lu_ucred_key_init, lu_ucred_key_fini */
00053 LU_KEY_INIT_FINI(lu_ucred, struct lu_ucred);
00054 
00055 static struct lu_context_key lu_ucred_key = {
00056         .lct_tags = LCT_SERVER_SESSION,
00057         .lct_init = lu_ucred_key_init,
00058         .lct_fini = lu_ucred_key_fini
00059 };
00060 
00065 struct lu_ucred *lu_ucred(const struct lu_env *env)
00066 {
00067         if (!env->le_ses)
00068                 return NULL;
00069         return lu_context_key_get(env->le_ses, &lu_ucred_key);
00070 }
00071 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lu_ucred);
00072 
00077 struct lu_ucred *lu_ucred_check(const struct lu_env *env)
00078 {
00079         struct lu_ucred *uc = lu_ucred(env);
00080         if (uc && uc->uc_valid != UCRED_OLD && uc->uc_valid != UCRED_NEW)
00081                 return NULL;
00082         return uc;
00083 }
00084 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lu_ucred_check);
00085 
00090 struct lu_ucred *lu_ucred_assert(const struct lu_env *env)
00091 {
00092         struct lu_ucred *uc = lu_ucred_check(env);
00093         LASSERT(uc != NULL);
00094         return uc;
00095 }
00096 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lu_ucred_assert);
00097 
00098 int lu_ucred_global_init(void)
00099 {
00100         LU_CONTEXT_KEY_INIT(&lu_ucred_key);
00101         return lu_context_key_register(&lu_ucred_key);
00102 }
00103 
00104 void lu_ucred_global_fini(void)
00105 {
00106         lu_context_key_degister(&lu_ucred_key);
00107 }
